SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyRemoteInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class GameManager extends GameObservable implements Serializable, Remote, MyRemoteInterface
Singleton that represents the front-end logic of the server and exposes the endpoint method that every client can call, it manages the requests creating and deleting the games
See Also:

    • receiveChatMessage

      public void receiveChatMessage(String gameID, String toUser, String fromUser, String message, boolean fullChat, boolean inGame)
      User has either requested to see messages (fromUser,message,toUser are null), or add message and get chat messages (gameId, null, fromUser, null, true, inGame) -> receive all the messages (gameId, null, fromUser, null, false, inGame) -> receive last 5 messages (gameID, recipient, fromUser, message, false, inGame) -> send message and receive last 5 messages
      Specified by:

      toUser -
